channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 12:49 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 12:49 Driven the alarm to the Donetsk region.Creck on further messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 12:48 Driving in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-March Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 12:48 Driving in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community-March Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
